definitions.definition: An atmospheric phenomenon created by charged particles from the sun striking the upper atmosphere , creating coloured lights in the sky . It is usually named australis or borealis based on whether it is in the Southern or Northern Hemisphere respectively.

main_definition: An atmospheric phenomenon created by charged particles from the sun striking the upper atmosphere , creating coloured lights in the sky . It is usually named australis or borealis based on whether it is in the Southern or Northern Hemisphere respectively.
